code: import{CodeIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import React from"react";import{projects}from"../data";import'./Projects.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Projects(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"projects",className:"body text-gray-400 bg-gray-900 body-font",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto text-center lg:px-40",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cd flex flex-col w-full mb-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"hd",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeIcon,{className:"mx-auto inline-block w-10 mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font mb-4 text-white",children:"My Projects"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap -m-4",children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.link,className:"sm:w-1/2 w-100 p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"gallery",className:"absolute inset-0 w-full h-full object-cover object-center",src:project.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card px-8 py-10 relative z-10 w-full border-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-900 opacity-0 hover:opacity-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"h2 tracking-widest text-sm title-font font-medium text-green-400 mb-1",children:project.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"h1 title-font text-lg font-medium text-white mb-3",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"p leading-relaxed",children:project.description})]})]})},project.image))})]})});}
